sections.heading: duties; relation and liability to persons interested in estate; standing to sue
sections.text: (a) A personal representative is a fiduciary who shall comply with the prudent investor rule set forth in sections 30-3883 to 30-3889. A personal representative is under a duty to settle and distribute the estate of the

sections.heading: 517(1) confers upon the county court exclusive original jurisdiction of all matters relating to the decedents' estates, including the probate of wills and the construction thereof, except as provided in subsection (c) of this section and section 30-2486
sections.text: Lenners v. St. Paul Fire & Marine Ins. Co., 1
